subtests.name: accumulate onto an underlying animation value
Composite when mixing accumulate and replace
accumulate specified on a keyframe overrides the composite mode of the effect
unspecified composite mode on a keyframe is overriden by setting accumulate of the effect
add onto an underlying animation value
Composite when mixing add and replace
add specified on a keyframe overrides the composite mode of the effect
unspecified composite mode on a keyframe is overriden by setting add of the effect
Composite replace fully replaces the underlying animation value
